response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,

I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that holds immense value and significance. This unique item, which I believe could be a perfect fit for your needs or aspirations, is now available for purchase.

I am offering this exceptional product to you at a special introductory price of $950,000. This is an exclusive chance to own a piece that not only meets but exceeds expectations in terms of quality, craftsmanship, and functionality.

Please consider this offer carefully. If you have any questions about the product or would like more information, please do not hesitate to reach out. I am here to assist you in any way possible.

Thank you for considering this opportunity. I look forward to hearing your thoughts and hope we can make this transaction happen.

Best regards,
Alice", "product_price": 950000}
